items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does shed
items.body: Was a very nice sweater Read more
items.author: Mike Salomon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but sheds too much for me
items.body: Nice. True to size. Started to shed immediately after taking out of the package. I will return. Read more
items.author: JW

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I hope it’s not too fragile
items.body: Really warm and soft but bits fall off. I’m afraid to wash it. Read more
items.author: SRTV

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Quality ok but asymmetrical
items.body: Returned due to left and right front pieces looking asymmetrical. The quality of the fabric was ok (as expected for the price). The colors were as pictured. True to size. Read more
items.author: FSSSLL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfy, slouchy, and surprisingly cute
items.body: i grabbed the multicolor in xl and this cardigan is amazing, so here’s the honest rundown. the fit & size is great. it’s intentionally oversized with a drop shoulder, so xl gives that easy, slouchy vibe without swallowing me whole. it hits right around the top of my jeans. longer than a crop, shorter than a tunic. sleeves are roomy and long enough to cuff once. if you want a closer/less boxy fit, you could probably size down; if you want that off-one-shoulder model moment, true to size or up one works. the comfort & softness is 10/10. the knit is that fuzzy “eyelash” texture. to me it’s soft and cozy, not scratchy, and i am super sensitive to texture. it’s lightweight-medium warmth. perfect for ac, early fall, or layering under a coat when it gets colder. the quality & constructio for the price, better than expected. the knit is airy (not stiff), the seams are even, and the front buttons are secure. it will snag, so treat it like a delicate. mine had a tiny bit of initial fluff shed, which calmed down after the first wear. the v-neck is flattering and versatile. wear it centered like a classic cardigan or slouch it off a shoulder. the texture gives it dimension without feeling bulky, and the button placement doesn’t pull or gape on me. the color irl it’s more earthy and muted than the glam studio pic. think soft blends of pinky-taupe, mossy/olive greens, and charcoal. i actually prefer it this way because it plays nicely with denim, black, cream, and brown. there’s zero itch, zero weird seams, and it layers well over tanks or tees. it says hand-wash only. i’d either hand wash or use a mesh bag on delicate, cold water, then lay flat to dry to keep the shape and fuzz happy. a quick steam out of the bag helps the fibers fluff back up. pros • cozy oversized fit without the michelin-man bulk • soft fuzzy texture; not itchy on me • versatile v-neck/off-shoulder styling • muted multicolor is surprisingly neutral and wearable cons • delicate knit can snag if you’re careless • a little initial lint/fuzz (normal for this yarn) • hand-wash care isn’t everyone’s favorite chore if you want a snuggly, throw-on cardigan that looks like you tried (even when you didn’t), this one delivers. it’s an easy yes for fall layering and just lounging. Read more
items.author: c ♡

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mislabeled - go with PHOTO not NAME
items.body: I ordered multicolor and got brown, which I knew was a risk (and is not a shipping error) since the names don't match the photos. Based on my experience, I'd say go with the photo, not the name, since again I ordered multicolor (which showed a brown photo) and got brown. It's SUPER lightweight, at least as compared to what you'd expect based on the looks. The fit is on the loose side, and I like that. The color is - well, not as expected, but as depicted in the brown photos. It's got an eyelash yarn so it's got some visual interest in addition to the marled colors, and it's warmer than the thickness would indicate but not heavy-heavy, either. Read more
items.author: Lisa S.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Deep Blue, Blue, Purple, Deep Brown, Multicolor, Hot Pink, Green and Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
